think_procedure: First, I read the description of the knob. The knob 'track_commit_timestamp' is used to record the commit time of transactions. It can only be set in the postgresql.conf file or on the server command line. The default value is 'off'. There is no mention of any special numerical values such as -1 or 0 that would change the function of this knob. Therefore, it does not seem to be a 'special' knob.
